alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Brantley; Clinch; Coffee; Echols; Jeff Davis; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Wayne; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 24 at 11:04AM EST until December 24 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 18 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Georgia. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, until 1 PM EST this afternoon. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 8 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Sunday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
